content: That looks like a solid plan! I think allocating 10% of my income towards savings and debt repayment is a good starting point. I'm also happy to have a buffer for miscellaneous expenses and to have a plan in place for my subscription services. One thing I'd like to explore further is how to make the most of my credit card rewards. I've been using my credit card for most of my purchases, but I'm not really maximizing my rewards. Can you help me understand how to get the most out of my credit card rewards program?
